info.name: Startpage yaGooglizer
info.description: This style makes Startpage (and IXQuick) emulate Google's current look. This style is loosely based on "New Startpage - SGL 3.0 (AIR)" by nimda.
info.additionalInfo: v1.0 - First release. Some work needs to be done on some details, but the majority of the styling is complete.
